channel.title: "resulting in something even harder than making a packet bot"
channel.description:
[b]NEITHER ME OR SPEL ARE FUCKING BOT OWNERS/PSERVER OWNERS, srsly guys on rsforums. Lolmuch?[/b] Speljohan has been examining the client. The owners of powerbot and rsbuddy have yet to see whats in for them, and they're trying to keep their userbase nice and calm. They're still probably getting script income, so why would they announce that they were stopped? This is very similar to the technique WoW used on its 4.0 Cataclysm patch that rendered private servers impossible (other than the existing ones simply loading the map files and characters) WoW didn't have a reason to put as much effort in as Jagex did. This was no quick act at all. Remember all the news posts that basically said "we're trying guys, well be improving our detection systems..." They've more than likely been taking names and really throwing a fast ball at reverse engineers. RSBuddy will not be even operable for weeks because everything it used is now gone, and once it is operable of simply loading the client, they bots can't see anything and scripts wont work.
[b]Yohanu (Speljohan)[/b] they've butchered the client for real all instance variables are gone it's all in a massive object array [b]Frell Bzigalsmichtz says[/b] so youre basically telling me that jagex knew what they were doing this time? and bot owners dont know what theyre in for yet? jacmob etc [b]Yohanu says[/b] yep [b]Frell Bzigalsmichtz says[/b] are trying to keep their community calm [b]Yohanu says[/b] i expected them to go this far [b]Frell Bzigalsmichtz says[/b] by saying "oh ill have it in a few hours" [b]Yohanu says[/b] eventually [b]Frell Bzigalsmichtz says[/b] so [b]Yohanu says[/b] basically [b]Frell Bzigalsmichtz says[/b] how to get around? [b]Yohanu says[/b] every object in game is an index in the array rite like every part of game engine the array is just an Object[][] meaning you can't tell what type is in what index and my guess is that everytime you connect all indices are scrambled resulting in something even harder than making a packet bot [b]Frell Bzigalsmichtz says[/b] thats what WoW did it pretty much destroyed private servers [b]Yohanu says[/b] ll so yeah this is luls pretty sure they do reflection checks now too as a backup in addition to more gradual updates looks bright finally i can actually talk to people in game instead of talking to walls (bots) [b]Frell Bzigalsmichtz says[/b] I quoted this convo [b]Yohanu says[/b] mk [b]Frell Bzigalsmichtz says[/b] for the faggot mscp 12 year olds who think theyre badass because they can load up a bot and hit start [b]Yohanu says[/b] ol

item.title: "resulting in something even harder than making a packet bot"
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:272, topic:419518”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=522066.msg3805906#msg3805906 date=1320460673]

On a different note… 17 hrs until the big rsbuddy update… but they keep making these count down things… all they can think of…

inb4only17hoursuntilanothernovelonhowlongitwilltaketogetthebotsworkingagain.

Spaces are your friend.

RSBuddy is delaying. They can’t find a quick fix and are therefore freaking out.

Did u c the website? He even admitted hes stopping rsbuddy, go look
[/quote]
Dumbsmack.

Hit me hard across the face. That’s what I get for posting about somethin i know nothin about.[/quote]
I know, it would be like me posting on how to pk.

Read full topic
item.source: "resulting in something even harder than making a packet bot"

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

They said like last week it would be last monday, they said before that it would take them ‘a few hours’, but a count down timer is a bit different. We’ll see if it happens. Even if it does, it would probably take Jagex less time to break it again then it would for them to fix it.

item.title: "resulting in something even harder than making a packet bot"
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:265, topic:419518”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=522066.msg3803707#msg3803707 date=1320267942]

Guys… not only was that ibot email real… but the lawsuit is real :S. It is completely legal, and they’re doing it. All accounts that continue botting after ‘bot nuke day’ will be named in the lawsuit.

Well I read somewhere (I don’t really remember the site) that jagex got the bot accounts illegally and that nexus might have a changechance against jagex IANAL

Im sure Jagex knew it was illegal and didn’t do it, but they could have.
[/quote]From Rsbots.net, they stated it was gained illegally.

I wouldn’t trust them. But if it’s Jagex’s game, how could they get them illegally?[/quote]It was something about going to court and getting every paypal with no legit reason

Read full topic
